page.title: 19BARGEDDIE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: { In 1953}on the{Coronation}of{Her {Majesty Queen Elizabeth 2nd,}the boys received a{lapel badge}and the girls a {brooch.The Reverend Orrock}came to lead a{service}for the{Coronation. {Then}they had a{five day holiday. We celebrated our{90th Anniversary on the{18th of December 1984.Julie {Johnston}in my class designed a{badge, given to all pupils,as a{souvenir.}The {picture}on the{badge}was of the{school We had a{gallery of pictures}from {times gone by.}People who had attended the school were there, as well as those who came to look at the {exhibition.}On show was the{school's latest{acquisition}our BBC {microcomputer Times{have changed}since{1895}when our{school}was first{built.
